list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add Flux variables CSV and enhance micromet functionality
Added a comprehensive CSV file for Flux variables, enhancing data tracking. Updated multiple scripts in the micromet package to improve configuration handling, CSV path management, and file compilation. Moreover, introduced new dependencies in the environment file and pyproject.toml to support enhanced data visualization and statistical analysis features.
Consolidated and eliminated uneccessary files

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Python tests.Python tests for footprint_tests.test_calc_footprint_values.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for footprint_tests.test_coordinate_system.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for footprint_tests.test_different_stability_conditions.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for meteolib_tests.TestEvaporationComparisons.test_radiation_limits.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for meteolib_tests.TestVaporPressure.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for test_converter.test_data_preprocessing.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in footprint_tests.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in meteolib_tests.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in spectral-tests.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_converter.py.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/paulinkenbrandt/Documents/GitHub/MicroMet", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "run.code.analysis.last.selected.profile": "pProject Default", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "com.intellij.pycharm.community.ide.impl.configuration.PythonContentEntriesConfigurable", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
Add 'secrets' and 'station_data' to .gitignore
The commit introduces two new entries to the .gitignore file. The '/secrets/' and '/station_data/' directories are now ignored to prevent sensitive or unnecessary data from being tracked by git.

Simplify environment.yml and add pyproject.toml
Removed unnecessary channels and dependencies in `environment.yml`. Updated the project description in `setup.py`. Introduced `pyproject.toml` for modern dependency and build management, outlining project metadata and dependencies, including optional development packages.

Add Flux variables CSV and enhance micromet functionality
Added a comprehensive CSV file for Flux variables, enhancing data tracking. Updated multiple scripts in the micromet package to improve configuration handling, CSV path management, and file compilation. Moreover, introduced new dependencies in the environment file and pyproject.toml to support enhanced data visualization and statistical analysis features.

Add 'secrets' and 'station_data' to .gitignore
The commit introduces two new entries to the .gitignore file. The '/secrets/' and '/station_data/' directories are now ignored to prevent sensitive or unnecessary data from being tracked by git.

Simplify environment.yml and add pyproject.toml
